description:
By running Essex Nova unit tests on Windows with:

python nova/testing/runner.py test_anytest

I get:

CRITICAL nova [-] 'module' object has no attribute 'STD_OUT_HANDLE'

To correct this issue, in file nova/testing/runner.py,

STD_OUT_HANDLE

should be renamed to:

STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE

At line 139 and 155.
title: nova/testing/runner.py on Windows: object has no attribute 'STD_OUT_HANDLE' (including solution)

comments.content:
By running Nova unit tests on Windows with:

python nova/testing/runner.py test_anytest

I get:

CRITICAL nova [-] 'module' object has no attribute 'STD_OUT_HANDLE'

To correct this issue, in file nova/testing/runner.py, 

STD_OUT_HANDLE

should be renamed to:

STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE

At line 139 and 155.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alexpilotti
